name: ZOMBIE HUNTER: Offline Games
description:
There is nothing more exciting than shooting in beautiful zombie games. And if you’re looking for shooting games to play anytime and anywhere, without the internet, without paying to win, why don’t try our ZOMBIE HUNTER - Offline Games?

ZOMBIE HUNTER - Offline Games is another combination between Dead zombie shooting & Apocalypse, except that you will shoot zombies offline through really challenging game matches. Thus, in the beginning, you might feel it’s kind of similar to some zombie shooting games out there. Don’t worry, it is much simpler but only better with:
- Story-driven offline shooting game (Campaign mode)
- Heroic characters have their own story and personality
- Nearly 100 modern weapons (Assault Rifles, Sniper Rifles, Shotguns, Machine guns), melee (Katana, Tomahawk, Machete), and thrown objects (grenades)
- Drones as side weapons and companions
- Unique zombies requiring smart strategy to kill
- Precise and easy-to-learn game controls
- High-quality 3D graphics and realistic sounds
- Unpredictable, steady non-stop action
- Theme-driven Event Pass: new unique weapons every 2 weeks
- Global Outbreak: online leaderboard to find who can go farthest
- Bounty: players experience special modes such as shooting big-headed zombies or only shooting at the body, etc.

This intense game is easy to learn to play. You will have fun for hours with endless shooting mode to train your skills as a zombie hunter on a variety of dead targets and mad zombies. Zombie hunter is a fearless shooting hero.

The zombie virus is unpredictable and dangerous. Fat zombies, jumping zombies, mad zombies, and toxic unkilled zombies are everywhere, there’s no place to hide. In ZOMBIE HUNTER - Offline Games, there’re zombies that can crawl on the floor and the ceiling. They can come to you at any time. So, be aware! The main rule of surviving in this world is shooting all zombies till the last day on the planet.

The game has diversity in weapon systems such as sniper rifles, assault rifles, shotguns, machine guns, and more. Killing is no more difficult in this shooting game. It gives you a cyber environment to use different shooting tactics in an open world of zombies!

LESS FRUSTRATION WITH OFFLINE GAMES
Most zombie shooting games require wifi or an internet connection to play. But when you decide to download offline shooting games, you might soon be disappointed with their low-quality graphics. Don’t mind, Zombie Hunter - Offline Games is at your service! This zombie game is a great time killer. With super nice graphics and cutting-edge technology, it will surprise you with shooting effects that are realistic and stunning in different gameplays. Save more data and play offline games!

BUILD AND UPGRADE YOUR BASE
Hunters also need to build their bases to ensure that they can survive through the world war zombie's tough time. A base is a place that can provide you with stuff that is crucial to join shooting campaigns and fight against zombie hordes! Death is coming to humans no matter by daylight or night, and no one can assure your life.

Download Zombie Hunter - Offline Games now! Get this fun offline game and ready to kill all the dead targets. If you want to socialize with other players in-game, don’t hesitate to join Leaderboards (online modes) and gain amazing rewards. A lot of awesome zombie shooting matches are waiting for you, so play now and explore all the great features this offline game has to offer.
